column5: Bedroom 2 in our condo which is located 10 minutes (6 miles) from DFW, 20 minutes (14 miles) to Love Field Airport, and 20 minutes to downtown with high access very close by. Located strategically near shopping and restaurants. Irving Mall is 5 minutes away. Public transport (bus route) is right by the community entrance, and most everything else is a short Uber/Lyft ride away.
column8: One bedroom with en-suite bath in bright condo
